text: It seems like Kanye West is still stepping on thin ice with Jay - Z! They used to be like brothers before Kanye started running his mouth about Beyonce during his Saint Pablo Tour and he went too far. This is what Jay - Z said about Kanye according to the latest interview that he had on the Rap Radar podcast.? # Jayz # Beyoncé # BlueIvy # 444 A post shared by JAY - Z ( @ jayzfanspot ) on Aug 6, 2017 at 6 : 07pm PDT ‘ Kanye is my little brother. He ’ s talked about me a hundred times, ’ Jay - Z stated this week. He even made a song called Big Brother. ‘ We ’ ve gotten past bigger issues, but you brought my family into it,
